title: Video: First Look at the New Ventum NS1 Aero Road Bike
content:
On top of launching a new version of the brand’s GS1 gravel bike, it’s also made significant updates to its aero rode bike: the NS1. BikeRumor’s Racing Tech Editor Jordan Villella looks at the updated Ventum NS1 road bike and its updated carbon, recessed head tube, increased tire clearance, and new integrated bar.

Want to see what it’s like to take the new Ventum NS1 road bike out for a spin? Check out the video! For more on the bike in word form, check out the tech post here.

The post Video: First Look at the New Ventum NS1 Aero Road Bike appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Staff
